text: The Gateshead Garden Festival was the fourth of the United Kingdom's five National Garden Festivals. It was held between May and October 1990, in Gateshead, Tyne and Wear. The festival took place for 157 days. Over three million people went to the festival. ==References== Category:Festivals in the United Kingdom Category:Gateshead Category:1990 in the United Kingdom Category:1990s in England
title: Gateshead Garden Festival
